name: RUN! (itch) (Zain Bhandari)
description:
Team Size: 1 

Engine: Unreal Engine 4

Project Duration: 1 year

Estimated Hours (including preproduction): 400

This was the culmination of my 3 years at university, I've always wanted to create a movement shooter as it's a combination of my favourite genres (platform and FPS).  One of the core pillars of the game is momentum and I wanted this title to communicate this to the players. I hope everyone enjoys this game!

You can see the design process and other games on My Portfolio
